name: Techno Dream Pop (Prototype)
description:
Hiya!

Space Cadet Jacki here! Nice for you to drop in~

Had a lot of time to think stuck here on Mars so I decided to make a short shooter prototype. This was to test out a more pop-punk visual style as well as more aggressive mechanics to see how I'd feel making it. Let me know what you think~ no hard feelings if you don't gell with it, it's only a prototype after all! <3

With love,

Jacki Mars~
